mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product( product_id, account_id, product_name, product_price, product_category, product_info, product_condition, product_is_tradeable, product_reg_date, product_is_delivery_free, product_trade_loc) VALUES( #{prdtId}, #{accountId}, #{prdtName}, #{prdtPrice}, #{prdtCategory}, #{prdtInfo}, #{prdtCondition}, #{prdtIsTradeable}, sysdate, #{prdtIsDeliveryFree}, #{prdtTradeLoc} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.product_id, a.account_id, a.product_name, a.product_price, a.product_category, a.product_info, a.product_condition, a.product_is_tradeable, a.product_reg_date, a.product_update_date, a.product_is_delivery_free, a.product_like_cnt, a.product_trade_loc, a.product_trade_status, b.file_name, b.file_path, c.user_id FROM product a INNER JOIN image_file b ON a.product_id = b.product_id INNER JOIN site_user c ON a.account_id = c.account_id WHERE a.product_id = #{prdtId}

SELECT a.product_id, a.account_id, a.product_name, a.product_price, a.product_category, a.product_info, a.product_condition, a.product_is_tradeable, a.product_reg_date, a.product_update_date, a.product_is_delivery_free, a.product_like_cnt, a.product_trade_loc, a.product_trade_status, b.file_name, b.file_path FROM product a LEFT OUTER JOIN image_file b ON a.product_id = b.product_id WHERE a.account_id = #{accountId} ORDER BY a.product_reg_date DESC

SELECT a.product_id, a.account_id, a.product_name, a.product_price, a.product_category, a.product_info, a.product_condition, a.product_is_tradeable, a.product_reg_date, a.product_update_date, a.product_is_delivery_free, a.product_like_cnt, a.product_trade_loc, a.product_trade_status, b.file_name, b.file_path FROM product a INNER JOIN image_file b ON a.product_id = b.product_id ORDER BY a.product_reg_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_like(product_id, account_id, create_date) VALUES(#{prdtId}, #{accountId}, sysdate)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM product_like WHERE product_id = #{prdtId} AND account_id = #{accountId}
mapper.select: SELECT product_id FROM product WHERE account_id = #{accountId}

SELECT a.product_id, a.account_id, a.product_name, a.product_price, a.product_category, a.product_info, a.product_condition, a.product_is_tradeable, a.product_reg_date, a.product_update_date, a.product_is_delivery_free, a.product_like_cnt, a.product_trade_loc, a.product_trade_status, b.file_name, b.file_path, c.create_date FROM product a LEFT OUTER JOIN image_file b ON a.product_id = b.product_id LEFT OUTER JOIN product_like c ON b.product_id = c.product_id WHERE c.account_id = #{accountId} ORDER BY c.create_date DESC
